title: mle
author: mle
content: Hi,since EWTB (MATIC) is available on the ledger I wanted to test it with an amount. Source: Metamask EWT Token (EWC)Target: Ledger via EWTB (Polygon)Now I wanted to retrieve the tokens via mycrpyto. Unfortunately they do not appear in the EWC Wallet. Where would I have to search for them ? Is this possible at all ?Thank you

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: If the token is on Polygon, you can use their block explorer to search for the token's contract address and import that on your metamask wallet. I assume that's your problem? Not being able to see the token on your Metamask wallet?https://polygonscan.com/

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: You haven't specified what exactly you want to do. Do you want to send the tokens from Metamask wallet or mycrypto wallet to your Ledger wallet?I suggest you send the tokens directly from an exchange to your ledger wallet, since it will be very easy for you to select the specific type of network you want to use.
